sen.j: 大伴坂上二嬢（さかのうえのおといらつめ、生没年不詳）は、大伴宿奈麻呂と大伴坂上郎女の間の次女。
sen.e: SAKANOUE no Otoiratsume (dates of birth and death unknown) was the second daughter of OTOMO no Sukunamaro and OTOMO no Sakanoue no Iratsume.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: SAKANOUE no Otoiratsume (dates of birth and death unknown) was the second daughter of OTOMO no Sukunamaro and OTOMO no Sakanoue no Iratsume.
SAKANOUE no Otoiratsume (dates of birth and death unknown) was the second daughter of OTOMO no Sukunamaro and OTOMO no Sakanoue no Iratsume.
It is said that she was the second daughter of the Sakanoue clan.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: It is said that she was the second daughter of the Sakanoue clan.
It is said that she was the second daughter of the Sakanoue clan.
OTOMO no SAKANOUE no Oiratsume was her older sister.
OTOMO no SAKANOUE no Oiratsume was her older sister.
OTOMO no SAKANOUE no Oiratsume was her older sister.

sen.j: 大伴駿河麻呂と坂上郎女との贈答に、二嬢との婚約を暗示する節がある。
sen.e: There was a verse in a poem exchanged between OTOMO no Surugamaro and Sakanoue no Iratsume that implied the engagement of Surugamaro and Otoiratsume.
sen.cmt: 歌の贈答と解釈しました。
sen.e: There was a verse in a poem exchanged between OTOMO no Surugamaro and Sakanoue no Iratsume that implied the engagement of Surugamaro and Otoiratsume.
There was a verse in a poem exchanged between OTOMO no Surugamaro and Sakanoue no Iratsume that implied the engagement of Surugamaro and Otoiratsume.
